TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract BusinessCardView implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook._BusinessCardView

summary.span: 代表一个将数据显示为一系列电子名片 (EBC) 图像的视图。

span.span: Represents a view that displays data as a series of Electronic Business Card (EBC) images.

para.span: 这是.NET 接口派生的互操作性与相应的 COM 对象的托管代码需要 COM coclass。

span.span: This is a .NET interface derived from a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

para.span: 使用此派生的接口访问 COM 对象的所有方法、 属性和事件的成员。

span.span: Use this derived interface to access all method, property, and event members of the COM object.

para.span: 但是，如果方法或想要使用的事件共享相同的名称相同的 COM 对象下，强制转换为相应的主接口调用方法，并强制转换为最新的事件接口，连接到该事件。

span.span: However, if a method or event you want to use shares the same name under the same COM object, cast to the corresponding primary interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

para.span: 请参阅本主题的 COM 对象有关的信息。

span.span: Refer to this topic for information about the COM object.

para.span: 有关 COM 对象的方法和属性成员的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the method and property members of the COM object, see .

para.span: BusinessCardView对象，派生对象、 允许您创建可自定义视图，使您更好的排序、 分组和最终查看联系人项目在 Outlook 中为一系列电子名片的其中显示的每个联系人的联系人项目相关联的 EBC 设计基于 Outlook 联系人项目的信息。

span.span: The BusinessCardView object, derived from the object, allows you to create customizable views that allow you to better sort, group and ultimately view contact items in Outlook as a series of Electronic Business Cards, each of which displays the contact information for an Outlook contact item based on the EBC design associated with the contact item.

para.span: 使用方法集合添加到新的BusinessCardView 对象。

span.span: Use the method of the collection to add a new BusinessCardView to a object.

para.span: 使用属性可以确定哪些 Outlook 联系人项目显示在视图中，属性在视图中，指定每个电子名片的大小和检索视图对象。

span.span: Use the property to determine which Outlook contact items to display in the view, the property to specify the size of each Electronic Business Card in the view, and the to retrieve the object for the view.

para.span: 使用属性以允许或阻止到视图的用户界面的更改。

span.span: Use the property to allow or prevent changes to the user interface for the view.
